http://jobs.vusay.com/

Vusay's hiring! We're a platform for adding engagement and social sharing to the videos everyone's already posting and watching. We allow viewers to engage directly with online video content through our integrated, real-time video annotation system.

If you're excited about technology's potential to enhance human interactions and appreciate the power of video to engage, teach, and inspire, get in touch.

We're currently interviewing experienced candidates for these positions:

- Full-Stack Software Engineer - Head of Business Development - Marketing Lead

Check out our job-site and shoot us an email at jobs@vusay.com.
